title: falling as I am - still I miss the ground
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:last-frontier]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
+++ Again.
++++ From between the stars
++++ A living empty.
++++ Crawling with purpose.
@@ @@
+++ A dream
++++ Of a thousand worlds.
++++ Like wet supple flesh.
++++ Prepared for carving.
@@ @@
+++ Denied,
++++ It screams for release.
++++ For the abattoir
++++ To begin slick work.
@@ @@
+++ A void,
++++ A billion candles,
++++ A trillion voices,
++++ Abiding silence.
@@ @@
+++ Release!
++++ It writhes below.
++++ More flesh for culling.
++++ Simple surrender.
@@ @@
+++ My love.
++++ Green, blue, and beauty.
++++ Ache to catch the world
++++ Stretching forever.
@@ @@
+++ Refuse
++++ The skin that was mine.
++++ Falling as I am
++++ Still I miss the ground.
@@ @@
+++ Again.

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[/=]]

[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/falling-as-i-am-still-i-miss-the-ground/crawling.jpg |caption= [[[SCP-1959]]] during its brief containment at Orbital Site-2001. Its current whereabouts are unknown.|width=500px|align=center]]

@@ @@
